name: ExpenseX
tagline: Track locally, keep safely. Your financial data stays on your device, not in the cloud.
description: A privacy-focused mobile application for tracking expenses and income completely offline.
detailedDescription: Most expense trackers upload your sensitive financial details to remote servers. ExpenseX keeps everything 100% on your device. No accounts, no cloud sync, no data mining. Just pure, personal finance tracking.
headline:
Cloud services are intrusive.
You need Private Control.

detailedFeatures.title: Day-to-Day Tracking
detailedFeatures.text: Effortlessly log every income and expense. Categorize transactions instantly to keep your daily finances organized and clear.

detailedFeatures.title: Monthly Reports
detailedFeatures.text: Visualize your spending habits with comprehensive monthly reports. Understand where your money goes with clear, locally-generated charts.

detailedFeatures.title: Budget Management
detailedFeatures.text: Set strict budgets for different categories. Get alerts when you're nearing your limits and stay on track with your financial goals.

detailedFeatures.title: Payment Methods
detailedFeatures.text: Track spending across cash, credit cards, and bank transfers. See exactly which payment method you use most frequently.

detailedFeatures.title: Excel Import/Export
detailedFeatures.text: Take control of your data. Easily export your logs to Excel for detailed analysis or import legacy data to get started immediately.

detailedFeatures.title: Device Secure
detailedFeatures.text: Your data never leaves your phone. Security is guaranteed by your device's physical access controls and OS-level sandboxing.

points.title: Local Storage Only
points.text: Data is stored exclusively on your device's internal memory. It requires absolutely no internet connection to function.

points.title: Physical Access Security
points.text: Your financial records are as secure as your phone itself. Access is restricted by your device's lock screen pattern or biometrics.

warning.title: Backup Responsibility
warning.text: Since we do not store your data on cloud servers, you are responsible for creating local backups (via Excel export) to prevent data loss if your device is lost or damaged.

reviews.text: ExpenseX is exactly what I needed. Simple, fast, and no creepy tracking. The Excel export feature makes my monthly budgeting a breeze.
reviews.author: Alex L.

reviews.text: I love that it works completely offline. I travel a lot and can't always rely on data. This app never fails me.
reviews.author: Maria K.

finalCTAText: Download ExpenseX now. Completely free for core features. Take back control of your financial data.
